name: authorization-status
description: The current status of the authorization system, including configuration posture, errors, and recent authentication and authorization events.

fields.name: posture
fields.description: The current configuration posture of the authorization system.

fields.name: error
fields.description: Error information if the authorization system is in an error state.

fields.name: error-source
fields.description: Reference to the object and property that is the source of the error.

fields.name: error-details
fields.description: Additional details about the error condition.

fields.name: authentication-success
fields.description: A list of recent successful authentication events.

fields.name: authentication-failure
fields.description: A list of recent failed authentication events.

fields.name: authorization-success
fields.description: A list of recent successful authorization events.

fields.name: authorization-failure
fields.description: A list of recent failed authorization events.
